review_text: This tiny home was so adorable and perfect for our Memorial Day weekend getaway! It’s centrally located within an hours drive from a bunch of beautiful springs. This quaint shipping container is such a unique experience and we’ll definitely be back here again!

The shipping container tiny house was the perfect option for my long-term medical assignment. Very convenient location, has easy parking, and a very safe location at all hours of the day or night. Location is very close to the medical centers and local shopping. I am planning to stay in the shipping container tiny house for my next assignment of 36 days. Easy individual access and peaceful location.

The tiny container was pristine and perfectly comfortable for my husband and my short trip to Gainesville. Vanessa’s instructions for self check-in were very clear and intuitive and made finding the space a breeze. The inside is super cozy and squeaky clean, and the bed was also very comfy!
We didn’t have any face-to-face time with the host, which I honestly prefer. But Vanessa was on top of communication with us and available for anything we may have needed from her. Staying here enhanced our weekend and I couldn’t recommend it any more!

Vanessa offered a wonderfully whimsical tiny home experience. Excellently designed with high end amenities, a co portable mattress and cosy living space, this shipping container tiny home has everything you need and nothing you don't want. close to great restaurants and bars and entertainment on Mai. street

The tiny house was cute, clean, and exactly true to the photos! The loft bed was quite comfortable, and the whole place felt entirely private despite being just behind the owner’s main house. Fun place to stay for a couple days!
Perfect place! Just what I was looking for my weekend of bee college classes at UF. Beautifully kept storage container with all the amenities I needed.
The shipping container was perfect for my stay in Gainesville, it was just as advertised and felt like a fun adventure. Vanessa and John were super responsive.
This tiny place was very nice. Clean and exactly like it is described. Bed was comfortable and bathroom was equipped with everything needed. Good stay!
Great little place to stay! Definitely unique. Close to everything. Park in front with the parking block. Thanks for great stay

I highly recommend this BnB! It was a nice area to get away for a weekend. Everything is pretty much walking distance but due to the weather it was driving distance lol. But it was a nice cozy little getaway home for two people. My girlfriend and I enjoyed our stay!
I loved my stay! It was perfect for our weekend visit for a wedding. If you want to live out your tiny house dreams, then this is the place to be!
Had a great stay, the place was so cute and cozy and was perfect for our one night trip!
I visited for a solo weekend get away and the tiny home was perfect. Just like the pics.

Loved the stay! Vanessa described the place clearly and the instructions were helpful, the only thing i WOULD say if i had to say anything is that prior to the instructions of check-in at booking i was not aware this was behind someone’s home but that could have been my own misconception! I didn’t really find it to be any issue of privacy tho, as it is gated in it’s own little area. Very clean and smelled brand new inside, people who live in the home were very nice as well.
Full five stars from us :)
Second time staying - always the best!
Everything was as described, we had a great stay.
spotless and tidy, including an easy private entry, a simple but really nice outside sitting area. easy to find, and convenient to downtown and UF. Highly recommended.
Very cute tiny home! The space was perfect for what we needed! Would stay here again!
Excellent adorable spot for two people! Loved it and will hopefully stay again next time we’re in town!
Great little space! Super cozy and comfortable. Perfect communicating from Vanessa!
Vanessa’s place was super cute and very clean. It was great for our visit with our UF student. 6 minutes from campus. Would stay here again.
Super cute space! Loved staying there, disappointed that the internet was acting up but overall was a great stay and would love to go back.
Very cool little place to stay ….minutes from UF

The cozy house is just as it sounds- it was small but has everything we needed for a weekend away. It was sparkling clean and looked brand new. The loft bed was surprisingly comfortable for us especially for my 6’1” husband! The shower had good water pressure which is important to us. The pictures in Vanessa’s post are spot on!

Impeccably appointed, aesthetically appealing, sooo clean and neat (there wasn't even a leaf or weed in the pebbles outside), private, quiet, lovely.
Vanessa communicates every thing you need to know beforehand. And, being in Gainesville (UofF), the location is just one turn off a main road, and then literally only 4 min from Main and University restaurants and music. I have absolutely nothing to complain about here!
I can't wait to be back as I absolutely LOVED IT!!! Vanessa was responsive and helpful, and I was extremely impressed with the shipping container as you can see the pride they've put into it.

This stay was super cute! Nice for 2 people and very updated! My family is from here so they were a bit worried about the location of the bnb but we felt really safe! The place was clean itself but roaches were able to come in. We really enjoyed the host as she was very responsive! My favorite part was the bed! Overall is was a great place to stay and we would definitely book again!
This was our second stay. Vanessa is a great host. The shipping container is clean and perfect for two people.
The spot is cute and secure! I loved the giant gate around it, which added privacy. There was a designated parking spot for me as well.
This tiny house was cute and cozy. The pictures are accurate and the hosts were very helpful with any questions I had. The check-in/out process was very simple with easy to follow instructions.
This tiny home was very cute and clean! We loved our stay and would definitely return!
It was a great experience. Very cute tiny home that was near downtown area which was convenient for our trip.
We loved staying in the container home! It had all that we needed. We really appreciated the clear details for check in/out, clean and comfortable environment, and the complimentary coffee and beer!
Very nice!!
This was an incredibly unique, chic, and comfortable spot! I absolutely loved staying here and will certainly return.

The place was clean and a lot more spacious than the photos make it seem. Private outside seating area and extremely close to the downtown area. We had a lovely private stay and experienced no issues finding the place or getting in to the container
Vanessa is a great host and the Shipping Container is brilliantly renovated! Perfect for our quick trip and very good location.
Super cute and clean!! Will def stay here again!

Loved this place! A perfect tiny home with a private entrance. Very clean and organized. Lots of nice restaurants near by and host was very nice and responsive. Definitely a cute spot for a little weekend getaway!
Enjoyed our stay. Easy to find. Everything was clean and the bed was comfortable. Perfect spot to stop on our way to Disney.

I had an amazing stay! I needed a little getaway and it was perfect. Very clean and great communication from the host.
I would stay again! Such a unique and cute property.
What a pleasant stay this was! Def will be returning!

This tiny house is a great and unique place to stay in Gainesville. It’s close to UF campus and many downtown shops and restaurants. Vanessa was also a great host-she provided very thorough guides and instructions for the home. I would not hesitate to stay there again.
if you need to visit, move in/out a Gator, I recommend this tiny oasis. It has the charm and the space needed away from home. We plan on returning in the Fall

This was definitely a hidden gem in a great location. Definitely will be booking this place again when available. Very environmentally conscious. Everything about this place was inviting including the loft bed. The host very responsive.

Vanessa’s place was wonderful. I had to have surgery at shands, both my husband and I stayed the night before my surgery and my husband stayed the rest of the weekend there while I was in the hospital. It was a great place for him! We’re very thankful we found this little gem and would stay again. Hopefully next time for a game and not a hospital stay.

This is me and my other half second time staying at the shipping container , we absolutely love it . The host is amazing as well and never had issues ! We love this place and will love to come back for a third time !
Fun place to stay for the night! Easy to get downtown, easy check in. Nice details for such a tiny home!

This place is just out of a fairy tale book. It has everything you need to have a magical stay. Is private and quiet, and you wake up feeling like you are in a cabin in the middle of a forest. Mornings coffees were amazing. Super cool place.

Loved this little place. My favorite part was really how clear the directions were. Everything from where to park to where to walk to how to get in. Perfect. And an adorable kitty greeted us when we arrived!
Great experience. Would stay here again.
A nice, cozy place to spend a couple nights. Thanks!
Great stay at our first tiny house. Pictures were perfect! Bed was comfy and the local antiques and food were amazing. Great mother daughter get away! Would definitely go back!
We loved staying here! It was perfect for the two of us. Check-in instructions were clear and host communicated clearly.
We loved the Shipping container. This was the second time we stayed here and it was equally as nice, safe, clean and welcoming as the first. Would love to stay again next time we visit Gainesville!

Here in Gainesville for college lacrosse games. The hosts were amazing! Easy to get to everything as the AirBnB in centrally located. It was a beautiful and very comfortable place to stay. We would definitely stay here again, no doubt! We are now following them on IG. Love the idea and concept.
Great place. First time in a shipping container. Interesting plumbing set up. Great neighborhood and nice privacy.

We were in town (3 nights) for some D1 baseball. The field at UF was very close. This was a nice, quiet location in a neighborhood setting and the unique container was not visible from the street. Great tiny home experience. Very secure. Thanks for the unique vacation!

I stayed here while visiting Gainesville for the first time and looking at UF. Vanessa’s place was lovely. From the second I walked in the door I felt safe and secure. It was extremely quiet and everything locks up. There were curtains that blocked every window if you’re someone who enjoys absolute privacy. Not to mention the bnb was fenced in it’s own private yard with a gate that also locks. I really enjoyed my stay and will definitely choose to stay here again next time I’m in Gainesville.

This was our first experience using Airbnb and also our first experience staying in a tiny house, we thoroughly enjoyed our stay! Top notch from start to finish, if we are ever in the neighborhood again we will definitely look to re-book this place!
Very Enjoyable Experience!!!
Pretty neat place.

We loved our stay in the tiny house . Our host was wonderful as well. The tiny house was super cozy and very clean. Everything about the place was wonderful . Doesn’t even feel like you’re in Gainesville, plenty of restaurants less than 3 minutes away. I rate it 20/10 all day, definitely will be back!
Place was comfortable and I loved the set up it was a great stay for the weekend
Love staying at the coolest tiny house. Everything you need in one compact (but not cramped) container! Quick bike ride to downtown and great walkable neighborhood.
Will stay again. Ideal size and super clean/modern finishes. Comfy bed and linens.

My stay was amazing. Super cute place with the cozy relaxed vibe i was looking for. Location was great too. This place was exactly as described and was very clean. Had everything i needed and will for sure be back. Take a look at their social media accounts for some more photos and a pretty cool video tour!
Vanessa was responsive and we loved the location of the container. It was spotless too. We would go back again.
Great place and Host
This was our second stay here. This place has been great to us both times we have stayed. The host gives clear instructions and is very friendly. I would stay here if you are given the chance.
It was a wonderful stay! The directions were extremely clear to get in. Everything was super clean and felt very safe! Vanessa went above in beyond to make this air BnB a spectacular stay!

This was my second time staying with Vanessa. Really enjoy staying here because everything is super clean, comfortable, private and quiet. She has good amenities - delicious coffee, shampoo, body wash, etc. She is very responsive and helpful.
We have stayed here several times and will continue to choose this spot every time we come to Gainesville! It's literally just perfect! Thanks so much Vanessa!
Beautiful small container home. Thoughtful touches. Lovely hosts. Great location. Worth driving going to Gainesville just to stay here

Excellent place to stay! This is my 2nd stay here and we booked it for next weekend also. I will always check here first every time I'm coming to Gainesville! Great locale, so private, neat and clean, pretty and tidy, beautiful and efficient!

Just as pictured, everything is neat and clean. Extremely comfortable. Vanessa was a very kind and respectful host. Lots to see in and around Gainesville, a great location to explore Florida and Georgia from!
We couldn't be more pleased with our decision to stay here. Very roomy, clean, chic, nicely furnished, quiet, and comfortable with all the amenities we needed. We will definitely book again!
Great place for a short stay in Gainesville. Check-in instructions with pictures for parking and unlocking doors was very useful. Place was as described. Clean, modern. I’d stay again.

This place was amazing!! I was so sad to even leave!
Everything about the container was great, and every thoughtful detail was appreciated so much.
Adorable, clean and so cozy! I cannot wait to stay here again! 🥰
Try it; you'll like it! Tiny and amazingly livable, adorable, immaculate and well-appointed.
Lovely place with many amenities, a great experience!
Impeccable tiny home away from home - I am a happy repeat visitor! Ideal for my solo work trips.
Loved the place! In a great location and staying in a shipping container is super fun. Highly recommend!!

The tiny house is gorgeous with a color coordinated palette and a cozy vibe. Perfect location for easy access to downtown GNV and UF or for a quick excursion to Orlando. Such a clever idea to provide an opportunity to try tiny house living while exploring a new city. This location had everything we needed and it was calm, peaceful, and clean. The powerful AC kept us cool in the summer heat. As an added extra, there were bicycles available to use for enjoying the numerous bike trails around Gainesville. We had a great time at the Tiny House!!
Great place to stay. Lots of amenities. A++++ Host
This place is just as advertised. Super clean, very adorable, and lots of thoughtful touches! We plan to stay here again next time we're in town and it's available.
Immaculate and well built. It is a great place for one night or an extended stay.

The place is really cute and has all the little details you need all in a small space. The location was private and secluded from others while close to food and campus. The place was clean. The bed and pillows were soft. Overall, great place.
Such a great experience! An absolutely wonderful host and a beautiful unique space! :) Highly Recommend!

This was such a fun and great place to stay! It was exactly what we needed and everything was so nice and clean. The hosts were very mindful in all the amenities! Would definitely stay again! Thanks guys!
Perfect for a couple looking for a weekend getaway. Awesome and clean space!
Great place! Clean and cozy. Plenty of space and privacy. Everything worked great and host was very responsive. Would stay here again.

Loved it!! Place was very clean and way better than expected. The bed was super comfortable and the AC was nice and worked well. I also loved the coffee and coffee maker - great added touch. Can’t say enough great things about my stay here! Will be back!

I’ve always loved the idea of living in a container home, so it was so exciting to get an opportunity to spend the night in one, and it didn’t disappoint!
The communication and instructions prior to arrival were perfect.
Once we arrived, the unit was set to a perfect temperature and calm music was playing to set the mood. The unit was small, which we were expecting. However, everything was laid out so thoughtfully that it actually felt bigger than it was, and was comfortable for two people.
Thank you Vanessa and family for being such great hosts and for such a cool experience!

My husband and I absolutely enjoyed our stay at Vanessa’s Tiny Home Shipping Container. We celebrated our anniversary this past weekend and it was nice to be downtown and walk the city. I would recommend this AirBnB to anyone who asked!
Thanks Vanessa!
Fantastic place to stay! Definitely will be back!

This was a very convenient place to stay, We loved the location. It was very clean, comfortable, private, and cozy plus the parking spot was at the very front of the place. They were very welcoming! Definitely recommend !!
I highly recommend this place, easy home instructions, very private, air conditioned room, smells fresh and clean. Feels like you're sleeping in a hotel.
Amazing experience! The container was very clean and stylish! Would definitely recommend!!

Great location and comfortable stay in the Shipping Container loft- it had everything you need! Hosts gave great instructions and were very communicative, would definitely recommend and stay again! Thank you!

The perfect little place for me and my daughter. it was an adventure sleeping on a loft bed but fun indeed. It looked like the pictures. Sheets were super soft! Only would have liked curtains for the windows so I could have slept a little later.

Exactly as described, excellent check in instructions complete with photos, very responsive and communicative. I really felt like Vanessa wants her guests to enjoy themselves. It IS very tiny-so just be prepared. And the loft bed could be a challenge for some if a late night sojourn is needed. But Vanessa made sure I knew what I was getting into before I even booked-so I LOVED it! The little touches in the space and with the write ups after confirmation were perfect. Book it. And enjoy!

Wonderful and unique experience.
Vanessa was very communicative and attentive.
The apt was very clean, neat and well stocked.
Would recommend.
Amazing place! Clean, stylish, simply phenomenal.

Very clean and cozy. Amenities were very thoughtful. It was a great experience. I always wanted to stay in a container home. Check!
Note: Don’t bring a lot of heavy rolling luggage because the unit is in the owner’s backyard and it’s hard to maneuver over the grass and gravel.
Fantastic space and driving distance from some great parts of town
Quiet, convenient and adorable. Great place to stay!
This place was amazing everything was actually very accurate and it was a beautiful stay well worth the price and area it’s in.
Great spot to stay over for the night. Super clean. Super responsive— the wifi wasn’t working when we wanted to watch TV, they fixed it right away. Would suggest!
This was such a great place to stay! Really cute, super close to downtown, and had everything we needed for our night there.

This was the cleanest Airbnb I’ve ever stayed at. The shipping container was very comfortable and charming. Great communication from host. We took them up on their guidebook recommendation to walk through the preserve. There were 6 adult alligators basking. Pretty cool sight. I highly recommend staying here.
Just an FYI if your plan changes or you need to make a date adjustment, the host charged and will not give refunds
This stay was great! Very nice amenities! We would stay at this location again. I recommend you stay here! Very easy to find!
Fantastic accommodations made possible by even better hosts! I highly recommend a stay in what I’ve fondly started referring to as the “little blue box.”
Great place to stay! The neighborhood is very quiet and the container was extremely cute, clean, and comfortable!
Second time staying and it was just as perfect. Clean, quiet, so cleverly designed. Appreciate having a bike to use to get around Gainesville. Perfect pied-a-there for my work trips.

Me and my husband were looking for a place for one night because we were visiting Gainesville for our friend’s graduation. We wanted something unique and were really happy when we found Vanessa’s place! This container provides everything you need - from cozy bed to hot coffee in the morning. I really liked the Swedish style of the place. Despite the small space, you will be able to find the place for all your clothes, shoes or other items. The backyard is great, especially in the morning - it feels like you’re in the forest, close to nature. I would definitely recommend this place and we would be really glad to stay there when we’ll have a chance
This was a great find and a wonderful experience! We hope to be able to stay again in the future!
Place was great , the tiny home is an amazing place to stay . Will definitely be back !
Loved this tiny house! Checking in was easy, instructions were very clear and the house was clean and beautiful! 10/10 would recommend !

The apartment was so lovely, cozy and comfortable. It had everything that is needed for a wonderful stay and I also appreciated the small touches that made my experience quite convenient such as hanging shelf like above the bed, soft blanket on the couch, and more . This place is built and equipped with love.
Absolutely amazing place to stay. Close to a lot of cool things, and a different type of place to stay. Great experience!
Nice and friendly, easy to talk to on messages
Great stay. This tiny home has everything you need. The neighborhood is peaceful. The house itself is very private and quiet. Hosts kind and accommodating. Hope to stay again!
Wonderful hosts and super clean, cute, and peaceful space! Great way to see if a container is for you! Highly recommended!!
This place is awesome it was super clean and beautiful. For being a tiny home you still had a ton of space. When we are back in town we will definitely try to stay here again.
Great communicative host. Clean hip space. Highly recommend!
The shipping container is cute, clean and just as described. We enjoyed our stay there!

Vanessa and John and very kind and friendly. The neighbors is safe. I enjoy renting the bikes for the afternoon. The tiny house is very clean, cozy, calm, safe, well designed and practical. I really enjoyed my stayed and if I can will go back again.
Very clean and comfortable. Close to downtown, but quite and restful Enjoyed our stay very much.
We enjoyed our time at the shipping container, however the setup does make you feel intrusive to the hosts.
I was so impressed with this place! Every little detail was thought of and taken care of. A truly special experience! Would recommend to any and all.

This place is SO CUTE! Every little detail is so well thought out and the space is just too adorable. The surrounding area is really quaint and quiet while also being 5 mins from downtown. Vanessa is super friendly and helpful and has great communication if you have any questions or issues during your stay. The fact that they BUILD these container houses is crazy too, they are just so talented. HIGHLY recommend this space if you're looking for a cute bnb in Gainesville.
Incredibly clean and cozy shipping container home!! Seems to be in a great neighborhood, and easily walkable to downtown Gainesville! Check-in was a breeze. Would absolutely stay here again!
Vanessa’s place is cool, super clean, and well kept. Extremely close to both downtown and UF. Checking in and out was extremely easy and having a dedicated parking spot was a plus.

I had always wanted to try the tiny house experience for a few days, and this was a charming and functional space with lots of light. If you are a pro basketball player, this may not be for you - see "tiny" in tiny house. The space was very functional, clean, and quite nice. The location is quiet, just far enough away from good restaurants (you must supper at Harry's) to be out of the bustle, not too far to ride a bike.
Vanessa's container was wonderful! Sparkling clean, warm, and comfortable. Will definitely be back to stay again.
Comfy bed. Easy check in. Very clean
This place exceeded my expectations. It was peaceful and very clean. I really enjoyed staying here.

This tiny home studio is really amazing. It's cozy and has all the essentials covered. The loft bed is extra comfortable and the lounge beneath it is perfect for a movie night. The outdoor area is fully fenced in and feels very private. I loved staying here and I'm pleased to recommend it highly.
Without a doubt, one of my favorite places to stay in Gainesville. Cozy, quiet and comfortable.

This place was a dream. So clean, beautifully crafted, and very private. We loved that the sleeping area wasn’t cramped and we could very comfortably sit on the couch. We met the hosts and they could not have been nicer. I would highly suggest staying here even if it’s for one night.
Clean, cute, great amenities, and close to everything in Gainesville
Great place to stay and host was amazing. Their attention to detail was outstanding. Highly recommend.
Vanessa's Container House was adorable, clever, sparkling clean, and had everything I needed. Absolutely loved it. And the loft bed was SO comfortable...I slept like a rock.
We had a wonderful time. Would definitely stay again. I thought they did a great job at portraying it on Airbnb just like the real thing! Thank you for the wonderful stay!

I can't speak highly enough of this place! Beyond the incredible location and ascetic, Vanessa and her family added many thoughtful touches to the space. We had everything we needed for a cozy and short stay, and were pleasantly surprised by the comfort of the loft bed. We will definitely be back. Thanks again, Vanessa! :D

If you have ever watched shows or seen posts about shipping container or tiny house living and been curious to know what it's like, check out this outstanding Airbnb! Every single detail is perfect, from the natural light to the setup to thoughtful extras like pockets for your devices - and Hot Pockets in the freezer which were so appreciated when I came in late and didn't want to leave again to find a snack! I also used the bike which was great, much like the classic bikes I used to ride around Amsterdam when I lived there. Super professional and responsive overall a '10.'

My bf and I were in town for a disc golf tournament and this was the perfect place to rest at night! Super cute, clean, efficient, and resourceful. To top it off, the host was very kind and sweet. Will be back next time we are in town!

My wife and I stayed here for a game day weekend and had a great experience. The unit was super clean and even cuter than the pictures made it out to be. There are some quarks of staying in a shipping container but it definitely made the entire trip feel more like an adventure and it’s 10x better value than the overpriced hotels in the surrounding area.
highly recommend for out there and whacky places to stay at.
Loved this place!
Great place to stay!! Would definitely come back!!
amazing location
I had a great stay at the shipping container! Everything you need, very private, designated parking spot, super clean, comfy bed. The nespresso was a great bonus.
This was the perfect quiet private space! The bed was super comfortable and the place was really clean. We will definitely stay again!
Cool comfy unique place close to almost everything
This is the absolute best place to stay. It was VERY clean, and private. The location is right next to anything that you want to do in Gainesville. We loved the complimentary coffee and beer!
Super cool little spot! We only stayed here one night but I would absolutely recommend it to others who are looking for a fun and unique experience.

Quaint couple's getaway! Very unique and charming!
Felt like being at glamp camp and climbing into bunkbeds! Not too old at 57! Very clean, chic, and modern! Very quiet and private, as well.
A must experience!
Excellent stay and so impressed by the attention to detail and creativity. Thanks!
Vanessa is an amazing host, easy to reach and very welcoming. The shipping container is beautifully designed and has everything you need. Couldn’t recommend this place enough!!
A clean, safe, & awesome place to stay!
Super cute and clean place. Perfect for two. Nice and quiet and close to campus!
The BEST place to stay in Gainesville. It beats any hotel. 2 miles away from campus which was perfect. Safe neighborhood. Amazing hosts. Super comfy bed. 10/10 couldn’t have had a better time.
Cozy, extremely comfortable, quiet, perfect for 2!. I could literally live here forever!
Everything about the unit was accounted for! Cozy bed, warm shower, cool a/c, lovely nespresso coffee and everything clean, new & safe! Would stay again when visiting UF and traveling solo.
Loved ❤️. Super clean!! Super cute!! Will definitely stay here again!!
Nestled in a great location and is one of the coolest Airbnb’s I’ve stayed in. Feels clean and utilizes the space very well. Very cozy! Highly recommend!!!
Amazing. Loved it.
We enjoyed our first shipping container home stay!!!! Everything was perfect inside and out and I loved the privacy. We will definitely be back!!! Thank you so much for this amazing experience!!
Attention to detail just remarkable. This place is very clean, quiet and very close to all amenities, including UF. Needless to say I was pleasantly surprised. I would love visit another time.
Excellent stay at the shipping container! Everything was very clean and new. Even though the space was small, it was functional and comfortable - especially the bed. Great stay for a couple.

This sweet little studio house is perfect and works great! Very comfy and well decorated and appointed. Vanessa did a great job with instructions, it was very clean, had everything you need inside plus a private little “patio “ courtyard outside. Do it, you’ll love it!

Can't say enough good things! The pictures are perfectly representative of the container. Clean, neat, cool A/C, check-in process was clear & easy, neighborhood was quiet. Loved the mezzanine bed/living room situation. Perfect for a solo traveler.
Cutest little place ever with really great hosts
Was very clean and suited my needs just fine, as a place to rest in the evenings after long days. I enjoyed the privacy. I would stay there again. Thank you!
Quiet, clean, neat as a pin and the AC keeps it plenty cool. I’ll be in and out of Gainesville often this year and this will always be my first choice when it comes time to schedule my stay!
Extremely clean! Very romantic and cozy! Definitely will come back to this new stay!
We had a very nice visit at the shipping container. It is very clean. We enjoyed sitting out back. We highly recommend a stay there.
Hosts and location were fantastic, the place was beautiful, and I would definitely stay here and recommend this property to anyone who is interested

This shipping container is unique and pictures do no justice. Very peaceful and beautiful inside and out. The attention to detail when it comes to how they built it and the decoration is amazing and to top it off it's located very conveniently.
the hosts are great and it was a great experience.
Very great

Wow! I can’t say enough about this cute little home away from home. Super unconventional and chic! The container home was very clean and comfy. The owner Vanessa was so accommodating and helped me whenever I needed her (which wasn’t much). I would recommend this home to anyone person or a couple. It’s super romantic! Thanks Vanessa
Very incredible and unique Airbnb. Very clean and amazing owners. If you have a chance to stay definitely do so!

The container home was wonderful! It is ingenious what they have done with the space available! Darling and comfortable. Everything you need right at your fingertips! I wish I could have stayed longer to check out both sleeping spaces. The bed was SOOO comfortable I didn't want to get up! The hosts are darling and very helpful and accommodating. The location provided easy access to everything I wanted to do in the area. I would highly recommend a stay in this delightful B&B! Wait until you meet their adorable kitty!
This was a very clean and comfortable space!

We loved our stay at this airbnb! The tiny house was very clean and had all the perfect details. The check in process was very easy and it was located in a nice neighborhood. The hosts communicated great and were very kind! Would highly recommend this airbnb and will defiantly stay there again! 10/10 experience!

Had the real pleasure of staying here for an extended working trip. The container studio is open, airy and spotless, so it's super-easy to get comfy and relax. Also thoughtfully furnished and appointed with a well-equipped kitchen featuring a not-so-mini fridge and a surprising amount of counter and table space. Then there's the roomy, plush and supportive queen and the deep-seat sofa you can just chill on forever. And the container's stationed on an adorable, perfectly private compound in the hosts' yard, yet completely fenced off and separate from it, and adjacent to a pretty wooded lot that has a knack for attracting a bumble bees and cool forest butterflies like red-spotted purples. Makes for really wonderful mornings sippin something you brewed in the nespresso. Ample opportunities to partake in greener practices are a seamless part of the container's design and the compound, too. And Vanessa and John are great. Responsive, friendly, and sent tips on what was fun to do in in the neighborhood (which is walking distance to historic sites like the Thomas Center and biking distance to downtown and UF) when I was there, but hung back and let me do my own thing. I prefer auto-pilot stays, so that's a plus for me. Almost didn't want to check out.
Loved it! It was SO clean and inviting! Tons of privacy, very quiet and serene. The perfect place to stay in Gainesville! I’d definitely go back again.
We have stayed in many Airbnbs in Gainesville. This is our favorite. Roomy, comfortable and great location in Duck Pond.

WHAT A GEM!!! Everything about Jennifer & Eric’s place was absolutely perfect! Communication, location and cleanliness are all outstanding!! Space was much bigger than expected!!! Parking was plentiful…
